coreAtributes.name: Bascinet Helm
coreAtributes.description: An armoured plate helmet, complete with a mailed coif and padded leather cap beneath. Offers excellent protection against physical blows to the head, and it's been enchanted to accommodate horns.

displacementText.playerSelf: Undoing the clasps, you open up and remove the Bascinet Helm from your head.
displacementText.playerNPC: Undoing the clasps, you open up and remove the Bascinet Helm from [npc.name]'s head.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: Quickly undoing the clasps, you wrench the Bascinet Helm from [npc.name]'s head.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.name] undoes the clasps and removes their Bascinet Helm, after opening it.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.name] undoes the clasps of your Bascinet Helm, and removes it, after opening it.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: Quickly undoing the clasps, [npc.name] wrenches the Bascinet Helm from your head.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.name] undoes the clasps on [npc2.name]'s Bascinet Helm, before opening it and removing it.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] undoes the clasps on the Bascinet Helm, before wrenching it from [npc2.name]'s head.

replacementText.playerSelf: You slip on the Bascinet Helm, before closing it and securing the clasps.
replacementText.playerNPC: You slip the Bascinet Helm onto [npc.name]'s head, before closing it and securing the clasps for them.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hastily slam the Bascinet Helm onto [npc.name]'s head,before leaving them to close and secure it themselves.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.name] slips on the Bascinet Helm, before closing it and securing the clasps.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.name] slips the Bascinet Helm onto your head, before closing it and securing the clasps for you.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] hastily slams the Bascinet Helm onto your head, before leaving you to close it and secure the clasps for yourself.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.name] slips the Bascinet Helm onto [npc2.name]'s head, before closing it and securing the straps for them.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] hastily slams the Bascinet Helm onto [npc2.name]'s head, before leaving them to close it and secure the clasps for themselves.

displacementText.playerSelf: You lift and lock your visor in place.
displacementText.playerNPC: You lift and lock [npc.name]'s visor in place.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You wrench up [npc.name]'s visor, and lock it in place.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.name] lifts and locks their visor in place.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.name] lifts and locks your visor in place.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] wrenches up your visor, before locking it in place.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.name] opens and locks [npc2.name]'s visor in place.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] wrenches open [npc2.name]'s visor, and locks it in place.

replacementText.playerSelf: You drop and lock your visor in place.
replacementText.playerNPC: You drop and lock [npc.name]'s visor in place.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You slam [npc.name]'s visor down, and lock it in place.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.name] drops and locks their visor in place.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.name] drops and locks your visor in place.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] slams your visor down, before locking it in place.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.name] closes and locks [npc2.name]'s visor in place.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] slams [npc2.name]'s visor shut, and locks it in place.
